div.bibl: Skandinaven (Daily Edition), May 21, 1913. THE NORWEGIAN NATIONAL COMMITTEE

body.p: At the regular meeting of the Norwegian National Committee, the following report was given:
The Seventeenth of May festival yielded a fair profit this year; 6,510 tickets were sold, and the gross proceeds amounted to $2,439.75. Expenses were between $550 and $600.
The Committee will publish an annual calendar with the names and address of ten thousand Chicago Norwegians.
